data.title: BlackRock plans bitcoin exchange-traded product for European market: report
data.description:
Following the success of its U.S.-based spot Bitcoin ETF, BlackRock is now preparing a BTC-based fund to be listed in Europe.
source: https://www.theblock.co/post/339033/blackrock-plans-bitcoin-exchange-traded-product-for-european-market-report?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss

data.title: BlackRock Expected to Launch Bitcoin Spot ETP in Europe
data.description:
BlackRock is preparing to introduce a Bitcoin Spot Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF) in Europe, marking a significant expansion of its cryptocurrency offerings beyond the United States.
The post BlackRock Expected to Launch Bitcoin Spot ETP in Europe appeared first on Cryptodnes.
source: https://cryptodnes.bg/en/blackrock-expected-to-launch-bitcoin-spot-etf-in-europe/

data.title: Right-wing X account followed by Elon Musk shilled Indian memecoin
data.description:
Inevitable West was caught shilling a Hindu-themed memecoin yesterday despite apologizing for a previous memecoin rugpull.
The post Right-wing X account followed by Elon Musk shilled Indian memecoin appeared first on Protos.
source: https://protos.com/right-wing-x-account-followed-by-elon-musk-shilled-indian-memecoin/

data.title: Bringin Makes Bitcoin Easier To Spend In Europe
data.description:
Bringin founder and CEO Prashanth Chandrashekar has created a product that makes it easier for Europeans to live on a bitcoin standard and to onboard to Bitcoin.
source: https://bitcoinmagazine.com/business/bringin-makes-bitcoin-easier-to-spend-in-europe

data.title: FDIC releases 790 pages of crypto-related letters in regulatory pivot
data.description:
“The FDIC also looks forward to engaging with the President’s Working Group on Digital Asset Markets,” acting chairman Travis Hill wrote.
source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/fdic-releases-790-pages-crypto-letters-regulatory?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound

data.title: US Debt Crisis and Interest Rates Threaten Bitcoin’s 2025 Rally
data.description:
The cryptocurrency landscape, particularly Bitcoin, is facing significant volatility in 2025, driven by the looming maturation of a staggering $9.2 trillion in US government debt.
The post US Debt Crisis and Interest Rates Threaten Bitcoin’s 2025 Rally appeared first on Cryptodnes.
source: https://cryptodnes.bg/en/us-debt-crisis-and-interest-rates-threaten-bitcoins-2025-rally/

data.title:
$BTC Volatility has been relatively low the past couple of weeks.

Especially looking at the start of 2024 when price first visited the ~$70K price region.

Since then, we've seen volatility slowly dwindle down as price has been creeping higher this cycle.

data.title: XION Mainnet Event Promethean Saga Official Version Launched
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News XION announced the mainnet event Promethean Saga and will launch a week-long "Believers Assemble" recommendation to win points competition. It is reported that Promethean Saga is a chain event lasting several months, which will feature daily exploration, leaderboards and competitions between the community and developers, and explore XION's technological breakthroughs and ecosystem expansion. In addition, XION also plans to turn the application of the Believathon entrepreneurial competition to the mainnet in the coming weeks and months. XION's previously launched Promethean Saga early access version also broke the 150,000 mark in DAU recently.
XION is a wallet-free L1 blockchain designed for consumer popularization through chain abstraction technology. By implementing account abstraction, signature abstraction, fee abstraction, interoperability and other functions at the protocol layer, XION enables developers to create a secure, intuitive and seamless user experience. Previously, the project has raised more than US$36 million from investment institutions such as Multicoin, Animoca, Circle, Hashkey, Arrington Capital, and Spartan.

data.title: On February 5, the US Bitcoin ETF had a net inflow of 2,549 BTC, and the Ethereum TEF had a net inflow of 122,556 ETH
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News According to Lookonchain monitoring, on February 5, ten US Bitcoin ETFs had a net inflow of 2,549 BTC (US$248.57 million), of which BlackRock had an inflow of 2,524 BTC (US$246.16 million). BlackRock currently holds 585,398 BTC, equivalent to approximately US$57.09 billion;
Nine Ethereum TEFs had a net inflow of 122,556 ETH (US$336.54 million), of which BlackRock had an inflow of 100,535 ETH (US$276.07 million). BlackRock currently holds 1,352,934 ETH, equivalent to approximately US$3.71 billion.
